languages.text: "Знакомая пташка! На ней летают местные Адептус Механикус. От пиратско-контрабандисткой сволочи их машины легко отличить".
"I know that bird! The local Adeptus Mechanicus uses it to get around. Their boats are easy to tell apart from all the pirates, smugglers, and other scum."
languages.original_text: "Знакомая пташка! На ней летают местные Адептус Механикус. От пиратско-контрабандисткой сволочи их машины легко отличить".

traits.locale_text: "That's a familiar bird! The local Adeptus Mechanicus use it to get around. Their machines are easy to tell apart from all the pirates, smugglers, and other scum."
"That's a familiar bird! The local Adeptus Mechanicus use it to get around. Their machines are easy to tell apart from all the pirates, smugglers, and other scum."
"I know that bird! The local Adeptus Mechanicus uses it to get around. Their boats are easy to tell apart from all the pirates, smugglers, and other scum."
"I know that bird! The local Adeptus Mechanicus uses it to get around. Their boats are easy to tell apart from all the pirates, smugglers, and other scum."
"I know that bird! The local Adeptus Mechanicus uses it to get around. Their boats are easy to tell apart from all the pirates, smugglers, and other scum."

languages.text: “我知道那条船！当地的机械修会经常坐那条船飞来飞去。他们的船与众不同，不会被当成是海盗、走私者，或是别的什么人渣。”
languages.original_text: "I know that bird! The local Adeptus Mechanicus uses it to get around. Their boats are easy to tell apart from all the pirates, smugglers, and other scum."

traits.locale_text: “我知道那条船！当地的机械修会经常坐那条船飞来飞去。他们的船与众不同，不会被当成是海盗、走私者，或是别的什么人渣。”

languages.text: «¡He visto antes ese pájaro! Es el que usa el Adeptus Mechanicus de aquí para moverse. Es fácil distinguir sus naves de las de los piratas, los contrabandistas y el resto de escoria».
languages.original_text: "I know that bird! The local Adeptus Mechanicus uses it to get around. Their boats are easy to tell apart from all the pirates, smugglers, and other scum."

traits.locale_text: «¡He visto antes ese pájaro! Es el que usa el Adeptus Mechanicus de aquí para moverse. Es fácil distinguir sus naves de las de los piratas, los contrabandistas y el resto de escoria».

languages.text: 「あの鳥は知っている！うちの帝国技術局がアレを使って移動してた。あの人達のボートは、海賊とか密輸人とか、他の連中のとは見分けやすいんだ」
languages.original_text: "I know that bird! The local Adeptus Mechanicus uses it to get around. Their boats are easy to tell apart from all the pirates, smugglers, and other scum."

traits.locale_text: 「あの鳥は知っている！うちの帝国技術局がアレを使って移動してた。あの人達のボートは、海賊とか密輸人とか、他の連中のとは見分けやすいんだ」

languages.text: "Ich kenne diesen Vogel! Die vom Adeptus Mechanicus hier benutzen sie zur Fortbewegung. Ihre Boote sind von allen Piraten, Schmugglern und anderem Abschaum leicht zu unterscheiden."
languages.original_text: "I know that bird! The local Adeptus Mechanicus uses it to get around. Their boats are easy to tell apart from all the pirates, smugglers, and other scum."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kenne diesen Vogel! Die vom Adeptus Mechanicus hier benutzen sie zur Fortbewegung. Ihre Boote sind von allen Piraten, Schmugglern und anderem Abschaum leicht zu unterscheiden."

languages.text: « Je le connais, ce vaisseau ! La branche locale de l'Adeptus Mechanicus s'en sert pour se déplacer. On a aucun mal à faire la différence entre leurs navires et ceux des pirates, des contrebandiers et des autres vermines. »
languages.original_text: "I know that bird! The local Adeptus Mechanicus uses it to get around. Their boats are easy to tell apart from all the pirates, smugglers, and other scum."

traits.locale_text: « Je le connais, ce vaisseau ! La branche locale de l'Adeptus Mechanicus s'en sert pour se déplacer. On a aucun mal à faire la différence entre leurs navires et ceux des pirates, des contrebandiers et des autres vermines. »

languages.text: "O kuşu biliyorum! Yerel Adeptus Mechanicus onu yolculuk yapmada kullanır. Onlarınkini; korsan, kaçakçı ve diğer pisliklerin gemilerinden ayırt etmesi kolay."
languages.original_text: "I know that bird! The local Adeptus Mechanicus uses it to get around. Their boats are easy to tell apart from all the pirates, smugglers, and other scum."

traits.locale_text: "O kuşu tanıyorum! Onu yolculuk etmek için yerel Adeptus Mechanicus kullanır. Gemilerini korsanlarınkinden, kaçakçılarınkinden ve diğer pisliklerinkinden ayırt etmesi kolay."
